00011 
00012         ros::Duration(3).sleep(); //wait for other nodes to get raised
00013         double simRate;

00016

00019         ROS_INFO("simNode up");
00020 
00021         while (ros::ok())
00022         {

00026 
00027                 if (isnan(uav.states.velocity.linear.x))
00028                 {
00029                         ROS_FATAL("State NAN detected on main!");
